description: The M-1 Tag Team Grand Prix finally kicks off! The race will determine the top mermaid and winner of 10 million yen! Too bad there’s a big frog and a cyclone in the way. This Episode has three different Endings, this is the Shitara-Ending.

titles.title: Heart Pounding! Actress Packed Mermaid Grand Prix! Shitara
アリス・ギア・アイギス ～ドキッ！アクトレスだらけのマーメイドグランプリ♡～
